entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Onefour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:32 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Onefour AAFC 01:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:58 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:58 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 9:58 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
